resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103356</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103356</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212992</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Vertical Structure of the Atmosphere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vertikale Struktur der Atmosphäre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure verticale de l'atmosphère</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura vertical da atmosfera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura verticale dell'atmosfera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάθετη δομή της ατμόσφαιρας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura vertical de la atmósfera</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This interactive resource produced for Teachers' Domain describes the changes in temperature, pressure, and gaseous composition of the atmosphere as the altitude increases. Grades 6-12.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses interaktive Hilfsmittel produzierte für 
Gebiet der Lehrer beschreibt die Änderungen in der Temperatur, im 
Druck und im gasförmigen Aufbau der Atmosphäre, wie die Höhe sich 
erhöht. Grade 6-12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette ressource interactive a produit pour le 
domaine des professeurs décrit les changements de la température, de
la pression, et de la composition gazeuse de l'atmosphère à mesure 
que l'altitude augmente. Catégories 6-12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este recurso interativo produziu para o domínio 
dos professores descreve as mudanças na temperatura, na pressão, e 
na composição gasosa da atmosfera como a altura aumenta. 
Classes 6-12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa risorsa interattiva ha prodotto per il 
settore degli insegnanti descrive i cambiamenti in temperatura, 
pressione e composizione gassosa dell'atmosfera come l'altezza 
aumenta. Gradi 6-12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διαλογικό στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς που παράγεται
για τη δικτυακή γειτονιά των δασκάλων περιγράφει τις αλλαγές στη 
θερμοκρασία, την πίεση, και την αεριώδη σύνθεση της ατμόσφαιρας 
καθώς το ύψος αυξάνεται. Βαθμοί 6-12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este recurso interactivo produjo para el dominio 
de los profesores describe los cambios en temperatura, la presión, y 
la composición gaseosa de la atmósfera como la altitud aumenta. 
Grados 6-12.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:WGBH EDUCATIONAL FOUNDATION
FN:WGBH EDUCATIONAL FOUNDATION
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212992</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103356</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/vertical-structure-of-the-atmosphere</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
